value_claims.claim_title: Reduced testing time from days to hours
value_claims.claim_description: Battery of tests on components and essences that previously took days are now performed in hours using Google Cloud Platform. A specific water box model test was reduced from 48 hours to 13 hours.
value_claims.source_quote: A battery of tests on components and essences, something essential for Natura's business, that used to take days are now performed in hours using Google Cloud Platform
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Virtual molecule testing using algorithms on GKE directly replaced lab testing, with explicit time reduction metrics attributed to the cloud platform.

value_claims.claim_description: Since Natura started using Google Cloud Platform, it reduced its products' time-to-market by one third, from 1 year to 8 months.
value_claims.source_quote: Since Natura started using the platform, it reduced its products' time-to-market by one third, from 1 year to 8 months
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Time-to-market reduction explicitly attributed to using the platform for virtual testing, enabling faster product development cycles.

value_claims.claim_description: The test project in the cloud's virtual environment meant spending only 10% of the projected investments, allowing Natura to channel resources to other investments.
value_claims.source_quote: The test project in the cloud's virtual environment meant spending only 10% of the projected investments
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cost savings directly attributed to implementing the virtual testing environment on Google Cloud Platform instead of physical infrastructure.

value_claims.claim_title: Created much larger test volume than expected
value_claims.claim_description: With a lower cost per test enabled by the cloud platform, the company managed to create a much larger volume of tests than expected.
value_claims.source_quote: With a lower cost per test, the company managed to create a much larger volume than expected
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Increased test volume directly enabled by lower per-test costs from cloud-based virtual testing infrastructure.

value_claims.claim_description: Between 200 and 300 testing processes are carried out simultaneously, which is only possible thanks to the cloud's computer scaling capabilities.
value_claims.source_quote: between 200 and 300 processes like this one are carried out simultaneously, which is only possible thanks to the cloud's computer scaling
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Simultaneous processing capability explicitly attributed to cloud scaling, enabling parallel execution impossible with previous infrastructure.

value_claims.claim_title: Eliminated animal and human testing for substance evaluation
value_claims.claim_description: Current methodology looks into components, concentrations and reactions without using skin from a person or animal, simulating impact through virtual molecules in cloud environment.
value_claims.source_quote: our current methodology looks into components, concentrations and reactions without using skin from a person or animal, simulating its impact
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Virtual molecule simulation on cloud platform directly replaced in vitro and living being testing methods.

value_claims.claim_title: Eliminated 17+ hours of manual work per week in finance
value_claims.claim_description: Finance team used AppSheet to build automated workflow for monthly financial close processes, eliminating more than 17 hours of menial work per week.
value_claims.source_quote: With the new app, the team eliminated more than 17 hours of menial work per week and can now focus on strategic work like forecasting
value_claims.quote_location: The switch to Google Workspace and AppSheet section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Automated workflow built with AppSheet directly eliminated manual work, with explicit time savings attributed to the application.

value_claims.claim_title: Reduced information search time from 30 minutes to 5 minutes
value_claims.claim_description: Knowledge base built with Google Sites reduced the time it takes to find documents from 30 minutes down to five minutes.
value_claims.source_quote: This streamlined workflow has not only accelerated our training but reduced the time it takes to find documents from 30 minutes down to five
value_claims.quote_location: The switch to Google Workspace and AppSheet section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Search time reduction attributed to consolidated knowledge base with searchable content, though AI role is supporting rather than primary mechanism.

value_claims.claim_description: Within the first six months after migration to Google Workspace, 80% of employees who participated in training and development programs reported satisfaction.
value_claims.source_quote: Within the first six months after our migration, 80% of employees who participated in the training and development programs reported satisfaction with Workspace
value_claims.quote_location: The switch to Google Workspace and AppSheet section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Satisfaction metric relates to collaboration platform adoption rather than direct AI capability, though platform enables AI features.

value_claims.claim_title: Migrated 900 TB of data in six months
value_claims.claim_description: Successfully migrated 900 TB of data and 20,000+ accounts from legacy solution to Google Workspace in just six months.
value_claims.source_quote: We had 20,000 accounts in 14 countries in Latin America and over 900 TB of data to move from legacy solutions...complete the complex transition in just six months
value_claims.quote_location: The switch to Google Workspace and AppSheet section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Migration achievement demonstrates platform capability but not direct AI value creation; contextual to enabling future AI applications.

context_claims.claim_title: Natura is a 50-year-old Brazilian cosmetics company
context_claims.claim_description: Natura is a Brazilian company established in 1969 devoted to sustainable, natural cosmetics production, with 6,400 collaborators.
context_claims.source_quote: Natura is a 50-year-old Brazilian company that serves the cosmetics market with products created from natural substances

context_claims.claim_title: Part of Natura & Co Group with R$7.7 billion turnover
context_claims.claim_description: Natura is part of the Natura & Co Group, owner of Natura, Aesop and The Body Shop brands. The Group's turnover in 2017 was around R$7.7 billion.
context_claims.source_quote: The Group's turnover in 2017 was around R$7.7 billion

context_claims.claim_title: Operates in cosmetics and personal care industry
context_claims.claim_description: Natura serves the cosmetics market with products created from natural substances, especially from the Amazon region.
context_claims.source_quote: serves the cosmetics market with products created from natural substances (especially from the Amazon region)

context_claims.claim_title: Committed to sustainability and natural products
context_claims.claim_description: Natura's mission focuses on providing well-being and harmonic relations with nature, with commitment to sustainable sourcing and environmental responsibility.
context_claims.source_quote: providing well-being, harmonic relations of individuals with themselves, with others and with nature

context_claims.claim_title: Research and development for product testing
context_claims.claim_description: Testing active ingredients and substances is essential for Natura's business, involving component and essence evaluation for product development.
context_claims.source_quote: A battery of tests on components and essences, something essential for Natura's business
context_claims.apqc_name: Develop and manage products and services

context_claims.claim_description: The company's cloud projects started in 2015 with a view to operating in multiple clouds, with goal to remove own datacenters by 2020.
context_claims.source_quote: The company's cloud projects started in 2015 with a view to operating in multiple clouds

context_claims.claim_description: Most recent project involving testing active ingredients in virtual environment started in April 2018.
context_claims.source_quote: Its most recent project, which started in April this year, involves testing active ingredients

context_claims.claim_description: Test department team consisted of an IT specialist and a biotechnology researcher.
context_claims.source_quote: how small the test department team was: an IT specialist and a biotechnology researcher

context_claims.claim_description: Natura acquired The Body Shop for 1 billion Euros in June 2017, a British company with presence in 65 countries, 22,000 collaborators and over 3,000 stores.
context_claims.source_quote: the acquisition of The Body Shop for 1 billion Euros in June 2017, a British giant with presence in 65 countries

context_claims.claim_description: Natura operates in 14 Latin American countries with 20,000 accounts across the region.
context_claims.source_quote: We had 20,000 accounts in 14 countries in Latin America

context_claims.claim_description: Created Bio-Lake environment, a biocomputing data repository on Google Cloud Platform where all metrics and data from Natura's researches and business are located.
context_claims.source_quote: Bio-Lake environment (a variation of the Data Lake, a data repository in natural format with structured and non-structured information)

context_claims.claim_description: Vision to be a data-driven company and give everyone access to data needed to innovate and help Natura grow.
context_claims.source_quote: We wanted to be a data-driven company and give everyone access to the data they needed to innovate and help Natura grow
